column5: In the heart of downtown Bandera, sits this quaint 2 person haus. Plenty of cowboy appointed furnishings. Back porch. Motorcycle friendly. 3 blocks to 11th St. Cowboy Bar. Walk to the Medina River and City Park. 4 blocks to Main St. Shower/Tub combo. High End furnishings! No Pets Allowed. Out door BBQ pit.
